channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall; Meta, Microsoft Sell Off
item.description: U.S. stocks traded lower, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq leading the way down as earnings season for Big Tech rolls on.

item.title: Mastercard’s stock turns lower but analyst highlights this encouraging trend
item.description: Mastercard’s earnings showed the company widening the growth spread versus Visa in debit, suggesting the benefits of market-share gains.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Slips Ahead of Storage Data
item.description: Natural gas futures fell ahead of weekly inventory data as mild near-term weather forecasts keep a lid on expected demand.

item.title: Sterling Could Rise Further on Prospects of Moderate BOE Rate Cuts
item.description: Sterling was a touch higher against the dollar and UBS said relatively higher U.K. interest rates compared with rates elsewhere, should favor the poun...

item.title: Oil prices find footing on strong U.S. fuel demand
item.description: Oil futures were on track to end a rocky October on a positive note.

item.title: That Actively Managed Mutual Fund You're Paying For? It's Looking Pretty Passive
item.description: Over the past 50 years or so, active funds’ returns have converged toward those of their underlying indexes, research finds. Small-cap funds are the e...

item.title: ‘DJT’ stock has seen ‘aggressive’ selling by retail investors leading into election
item.description: During Donald Trump’s 2024 campaign for president, investors have used shares of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. as a way to bet on the outcome o...

item.title: Big Tech Is Paving the Way for a Nuclear Breakthrough
item.description: Small modular reactors could eventually make the power source cheaper, safer and faster to build.

item.title: Need a break from election angst? Here’s what’s worth streaming in November 2024.
item.description: There’s a ton to watch, including Apple’s ‘Bad Sisters,’ Netflix’s ‘A Man on the Inside’ and Paramount’s ‘The Agency’

item.title: ‘Sorry, not sorry’: I don’t have kids and I’m not spending a fortune on candy this Halloween. Does that make me a bad person?
item.description: ‘Monsters and ghouls and ghosts? I could care less’
